channel.title: Nsdate on Andy Ibanez
channel.description: Recent content in Nsdate on Andy Ibanez

item.title: The NSDateInterval Object
item.description: Somehow, this shiny new object, which was actually introduced in iOS 10, flew past my radar. Today I want to take a few minutes to talk about the NSDateInterval object. This object allows us to quickly calculate the time interval (represented as a NSTimeInterval) between dates, it allows us to check if two dates overlap, and it allows us to check if a given date is within a certain interval.
